blocks.value: St. Bernadette Soubirous was born in 1844 in Lourdes, France, to a very poor family. In 1858, when she was 14 years old, the Blessed Virgin Mary appeared to her 18 times at the grotto of Massabielle. Mary identified herself as the "Immaculate Conception" and asked that a chapel be built at the site.
During the apparitions, Mary revealed a spring of water that has been the source of many miraculous healings. Millions of pilgrims visit Lourdes each year seeking healing and grace.
Bernadette joined the Sisters of Charity and lived a humble life of prayer and suffering. She died in 1879 at the age of 35 and was canonized in 1933.
